sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-drawer  :open="showDrawer" class="custom-class" root-class-name="root-class-name" :root-style="{ color: 'blue' }"
   style="color: red" title="产品添加" placement="right" @after-open-change="afterOpenChange" @close="closeDrawer">
   <a-form :model="formState" v-bind="layout" :validate-messages="validateMessages" :wrapperCol="{ span: 16 }"
     :label-col="{ span: 6 }" ref="formRef" @finish="onFinish">
     <a-form-item name="name" label="产品名称" :rules="[{ required: true, message: '请输入产品名称！' }]">
       <a-input v-model:value="data.formState.name" />
     </a-form-item>
     <a-form-item name="price" label="价格" :rules="[{ required: true, message: '请输入价格！' }]">
       <a-input v-model:value="data.formState.price" />
     </a-form-item>
     <a-form-item name="categories" label="类别">
       <a-radio-group v-model:value="data.formState.categories" name="radioGroup">
         <a-radio v-for="(item, index) in data.categoriesList" :key="index" :value="item.id">{{ item.name }}</a-radio>
       </a-radio-group>
     </a-form-item>
     <a-form-item :wrapperCol="{ offset: 8, span: 16 }">
       <a-button class="add" html-type="submit">添加</a-button>
       <a-button class="clear" html-type="reset" @click="onClear">清空</a-button>
     </a-form-item>
   </a-form>
 </a-drawer>
</template>
<script setup>
import { reactive,ref} from 'vue';
const formRef = ref();
let data=reactive({
 formState:{
   id:'',
   name:'',
   price:'',
   categories: {
      create: [
        { categories_id: '' }, // 关联类别的 ID // 如果有多个类别
      ]
    }
 },
 categoriesList: []
})
import { $categorieslist, $addProduct,$delProduct,$getProduct } from '../../api/proinfo.js'
let{showDrawer}=defineProps(['showDrawer'])
console.log(showDrawer);

let emit=defineEmits(['sync-drawer'])
let afterOpenChange=(val)=>{
 console.log(val);
 
 if(!val){
   emit('sync-drawer',val)
 }
 }
 const closeDrawer = () => {
  emit('sync-drawer', false);
};
let onFinish = () => {
  formRef.value.validate().then(() => {
    const newProduct = {
      name: data.formState.name,
      price: data.formState.price,
      categories: {
        create: [
          { categories_id: data.formState.categories }, // 关联类别的 ID
        ]
      }
    };
    $addProduct(newProduct)
      .then(response => {
        message.success("产品添加成功");
        loadData();
      })
      .catch(error => {
        message.error("产品添加失败");
      });
  }).catch(() => {
    console.log('表单验证失败');
  });
};

let loadCate = () => {
  $categorieslist().then(r => {
    data.categoriesList = r.map(item => ({ id: item.id, name: item.name }));
    console.log(data.categoriesList);

  })
}
let onClear = () => {
  formRef.value.resetFields();
}
loadCate()
</script>
